page.title: 16Education
page.content: There are 4 schools in our area; Saxmundham Middle School,Saxmundham C.P. School, Benhall V.A.P.School and an Independent School,Fairfield Prep.School. Saxmundham Middle School was opened in 1958 as a Secondary Modern School but became a 9-13 Middle in 1973.The number of pupils has declined from 393 in the year above to 275 in 1985.Saxmundham C.P. School is now a school for 5-9 year olds and in 1985 has 108 pupils on roll. The school was built in 1896 and has 4.5 members of staff.It caters for the children of Rendham, Sweffling,Bruisyard and Saxmundham. Benhall V.A.P. School was built in 1848 and serves the villages of Benhall,Sternfield,Stratford St.Andrews and Little Glemham.It has 2 teachers and 48 pupils.
